author: wpcarvalho
body:
#### PR description:

- This PR adds the XML file containing the PPS DAQ mapping for 2022. This file is the source for the most recent payload in [CTPPSPixelDAQMapping_Run3_v1_hlt](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/tags/CTPPSPixelDAQMapping_Run3_v1_hlt) tag, appended in early April. A PR should have been made to include the XML file in the release at that time, but it was completely overlooked. 
 
- No changes are expected as this file is only for keeping DAQ mapping versions documented in the releases, it is not referred to in any code and it did not even exist before.

  - link to any additional material useful to provide a documentation for this PR (slides, JIRA tickets, related pull requestes, hypernews, TWiki or Indico pages)  -->

#### PR validation:

Not needed.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Not a backport.
title: Add the XML source file describing PPS pixel DAQ mapping for 2022
